title: Adapting to a New Environment
description: Julia talks about starting a new job and learning how to adapt.
speaker: Julia
text: Earlier this year, I started a new job in a company with a very different culture.
The team worked faster than I was used to, and communication was more direct.
At first, I felt overwhelmed and worried about making mistakes.
I noticed that simple tasks took me longer, and I often asked many questions.
Instead of giving up, I decided to observe carefully and learn from my colleagues.
I took notes, asked for feedback, and practiced new tools every day.
After a few weeks, I began to feel more comfortable and confident.
I could contribute more to the team and even share my own ideas.
This experience taught me that adapting takes time, patience, and effort.
